com.sun.jna.platform.win32

Class Ddeml.CONVINFO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jna.Structure
      • com.sun.jna.platform.win32.Ddeml.CONVINFO
  • Enclosing interface:
    Ddeml

    @Structure.FieldOrder(value={"cb","hUser","hConvPartner","hszSvcPartner","hszServiceReq","hszTopic","hszItem","wFmt","wType","wStatus","wConvst","wLastError","hConvList","ConvCtxt","hwnd","hwndPartner"})
public static class Ddeml.CONVINFO
extends Structure
    Contains information about a Dynamic Data Exchange (DDE) conversation.
    See Also:
    Ddeml.DdeQueryConvInfo(HCONV hConv, int idTransaction, CONVINFO pConvInfo)

    • Nested Class Summary
